name: DemocracyOS
description: An online space for voting on political proposals. The software aims to stimulate better arguments and come to better rulings
author: Democracia en Red <speak@democracyos.org>

JWT_SECRET.description: A secret key for verifying the integrity of signed cookies

STAFF.description: Email of the Administrator of the App, this user will be able to do the first setup.

ORGANIZATION_NAME.description: Title of the app to be shown on the right side of the header

ORGANIZATION_URL.description: Link to take the user when clicks on organizationName

HOST.description: Public accessible URL to your app. For example: 'heroku-app-name.herokuapp.com'.

PROTOCOL.description: Set protocol to https:. Heroku supports this by default. Normally you shouldn't change it.

HTTPS_REDIRECT.description: This option forces the redirection from http: to https:. Normally you shouldn't change it.

DEBUG.description: Recommended default value for server logging, to see it run `heroku logs --tail` on your terminal.
